entry.title: Red & Gold Premium Pattu Saree – A Symbol of Tradition and Elegance
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samridhini
Type:
Price: 18699.00

Drape yourself in the grandeur of this exquisite red and gold Pattu saree, a perfect blend of tradition and sophistication. The rich red hue symbolizes prosperity, while the intricate golden zari weaving enhances its royal appeal.

Product Code: SM342

✨ Fabric: Elegant Pure Pattu Saree in Red with Rich Golden Accents, known for its luxurious texture.
✨ Color: A deep red base adorned with gleaming golden motifs, making it ideal for weddings and festive occasions.
✨ Design: Traditional floral and paisley patterns woven in gold thread, exuding timeless charm.
✨ Blouse: A perfectly matching red blouse with golden zari work, designed with a flattering deep back cut for a modern yet ethnic touch.
✨ Occasion: Perfect for weddings, cultural ceremonies, and grand celebrations.
✨ Styling Tip: Pair it with temple jewelry, a classic bun adorned with fresh jasmine flowers, and golden bangles for a regal South Indian bridal look.

  • Length: 6.35 meters (Including 80 cm of blouse piece)

This saree is a testament to India's rich weaving heritage, ensuring you make a graceful statement wherever you go!
